Amanda didn't seem worried, she just giggled. "Where to begin....I suppose I should start with this. I have the powers of a goddess."

"The hell are you talking about!?" You scream angrily, a loud bark heard close by.

Amanda just smirked at you, "Maybe it would be better to show you..." Your sister snapped her fingers and to your shock a mirror shot up from out of the ground! Aside from shock you begin to realize your sister may not have been lying before.

Warily you look into the mirror and see the dog you have been hearing, it was a small black haired dog, possibly a German Shepherd, you weren't a dog expert so you weren't sure.

"This mirrors busted." You mutter, the dog in the mirror was barking at the same time you were talking. Curiously you raise an eyebrow, the dog raised its brow too. You raise your left hand and the dog, his left paw.

You look confused so your sister explained. "That's the story, with my awesome powers I made Mom and Dad believe that through fake memories. They're grieving and stuff although you're right in the house."

You gasp before snarling again, "Then I'll tell them mys-"

"What're you gonna do? Bark at them? I'm the only one who can understand you, well me and other pups. You're fate is in my hands." Your sister said, smirking playfully.

"Get to the point! What do I have to do to return to normal?"

You sister formed a pouting face, "Fine, basically you do whatever I want and eventually ill turn you to normal. Kiss my feet, sniff my boots, eat people I shrink...whatever I want."

You warily look at her "And if I refuse?"

Amanda smiled again, " Then I do something to make you worse, maybe make you a person again only a couple inches tall. Turn you into a rat and toss you into some crazy cat lady's home. Whatever I want.

(What a bitch.) You thought, you sister smiled and said "I heard that!"

You let out a small sigh before asking, "Can you at least do a little better than a German Shepherd? I mean, make me a wolf or something badass."

Amanda laughed again, "Sure but in return you hafta kiss my feet, think of it as a celebration to my new pet!"

We took a left, then a right, then we went straight down a hallway for about a city block...and then three more. There was no way all of these hallways could fit inside the school building, but somehow, they did. "Mistress, if you don't mind my asking," I said meekly as we rounded another corner, "How can all of this be part of our school?" As we'd gone on, i realized that the structure was once again becoming more and more fancy, looking more and more like the corridors of a mid-evil castle than a high school.
"Well, i already told you i have the powers of a godess. But there's another god who lives in this city. He decided to hide out in our school to try and sabotage me from here since it's where i have the most followers. To help him hide, he made the school alot bigger on the inside than the outside. Along with that, there were two gods who attended the school, so it made itself even larger and more decorative." She smiled as she thought about it. "It also acts as a doorway to other worlds. Michael thought he could use the size to hide from me and the people who fell into our world to his advantage, but i've turned many of the newcomers into my followers and spread them out through the infinite parts of the school. So, i've ended up trapping him here, even though i can't find his exact location."
As i heard all this, i started wondering how this had all happened without my noticing. Had i been a bad older brother not to notice this kind of thing? Maybe this transformation was a good thing. Maybe by being a better dog, i could become a better person later on, better equipped to play the role of a big-brother....or...
I lost my trail of thought as we rounded another corner and ended up in a giant, decorative room. It's a circular room, with thirteen statues of my sister lining the wall. Each Statue depicts her differently. There's one statue that has her riding a savage wolf, dressed only in a black hood and carrying a spear, carrying herself regally and with authority. In another, she's covered from head to foot in silk and gold, holding a pot. Sometimes she seems monsterous, at others, docile, but in all of them, she's beutiful and every one makes me think of those selfish impulses our parents warn us against. She walks me towards the center of the room and i realize that in the middle, there's a small couch in front of a small water fountain. What's up with that?
When we arrived at the throne, she sat on it and relaxed. Within seconds, others arrived and got to work. I watched as she leaned back in the small throne, allowing her head to rest on a cushion and having all of her hair fall in the fountain behind it. A woman immediately began working on it. Two men showed up on either side and quickly undid her clothing. I was about to rip their throats out when they began to use paints to draw strange designs on her body. As they did this, another woman showed up and began applying paints to her face. She was getting a make-over! What would a good dog think?
I'm happy my mistress gets to let herself unwind like this. She seems to have a lot of work to do, so it's good she takes some time for herself. But what can i do to help?
As i pondered it, i saw her extend a leg and stretch her finely formed feet. One of the servants stroked it and took a deep inhale before kissing it and resuming his work. One of the main reasons she turned me into a dog was so that i could please her feet right? What better way to help her? But then again....This Michael guy was clearly a big pain in her side. I could probably sniff out some more of his followers and bring them to her brilliant justice.
